amendment.description: To ensure adequate safety at high-risk chemical facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4620 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S7388, S7390; text: CR S7388) To ensure adequate safety at high-risk chemical facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4620 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4620 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
